overview: What happens when you shoot an adult video in a haunted house? A lot of lesbian sex with horny ghosts! It all starts with a flashback to the 80s with Kira Noir and Lizzie Love sneaking into an old house for some hanky-panky and discovering a lonely and very horny ghost (Victoria Sunshine). Fast forward to present-day filmmaker, Pristine Edge, capturing Maya Farrell and Ana Foxxx engaged in truly haunting sex. Will anyone escape the masked serial killer stalking the house? Witness the all-ghost threesome with tongue-wagging & finger-banging train and ask if anyone would want to escape.
title: Final Girl
